panels.description: Percentage of the maximum connections as stated by the Instance Type.
panels.title: Used Max Connections

panels.description: 95th percentile of RDS DML Latency (the average duration of inserts, updates, and deletes).
panels.title: DML Latency (p95)

panels.description: 95th percentile of RDS DDL Latency (the average duration of requests such as example, create, alter, and drop requests).
panels.title: DDL Latency (p95)

panels.description: The average duration of requests such as example, create, alter, and drop requests.
panels.title: DDL Latency

panels.description: The average duration of inserts, updates, and deletes.
panels.title: DML Latency

panels.description: The NetworkReceiveThroughput metric tracks network traffic sent from clients. Unlike other RDS database engines, Aurora’s network metric does not include network traffic from the database instances to the storage volumes.
panels.title: Network In

panels.description: The NetworkTransmitThroughput metric tracks network traffic being sent to clients. Unlike other RDS database engines, Aurora’s network metric does not include network traffic from the database instances to the storage volumes.
panels.title: Network Out
